_comment: Quick configuration with single-point crossover and random bit flip mutation
_comment_profile: Fast execution with simple operators - good for initial exploration or time-constrained scenarios

_comment_crossover_descriptions.single_point: Single-point crossover - crosses over at one randomly selected point

_comment_mutation_descriptions.random_bit_flip: Each bit flipped independently with mutation probability

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1)
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability
